text: Good location value for money staff friendliness. Elevator a bit slow

Clean good size rooms and bathroom Staff friendly and helpful Good location. Accessibility of hotel on busy road Difficult to reach to find out where to park then to park across the road and then haul bags to reception to check in
Very good breakfast Great location. As in most London locations small rooms and small elevator
Good location near underground station There is kitchen in a room. there is no elevator
Good breakfast lovely rooms and great location right around the corner from north ealing station. No elevator
Nice and clean hotel Good location. The room was too small The room was in front of the elevator
Good location Friendly and helpful staff Spacious room Nice and free coffee at lobby Good kitchenette in the room Has a perfectly working elevator
Great location wonderful decor good service. remodelling on our floor which created noise and make the elevator area feel like a construction site
Very good and quiet location. Room located next to the service elevator shaft Disturbing and noisy Hotel pretty worn out and requires immediate investment
Close to underground Good location. There would be more room in a London telephone box No elevator from ground floor Noise can be an issue
Classy staff Good buffet both breakfast and dinner. Elevator small old and slow Rooms very small Location excellent for Buckingham Palace but at least five blocks from tube
Good location for getting around Most of the staff was helpful Good breakfast Very clean. Top floor is awful Beds are old and the street side is noisy even late at night No elevator

Convenient location Friendly helpful staff Good facilities Reasonably priced for quality and location. Elevator was outside our room and was very loud Large collections of dust between panels on the room walls
good location nice staff nice ground floor common area with meeting rooms. I was expecting a breakfast at a 4 for 259 pounds per night 4 floors hotel but no elevator
Ideal location. Room was not too good very dark and next to a service door elevator noisy in the morning Shower was bonkers powerful with the widest ever spray water everywhere
The location is very good and there are plenty of great restos and pubs around. The elevator is broken and the room is soooo hot as the aircon is not getting cold
Location. No standard amenities you have to to ask for toothbrush or laundry bag to a staff which is not convenient The elevator is quite old which I had a not good experience
The bed sheets were very comfy room was modern location was good. The room was very small there were spots of mould between the tiles in the shower the elevator was out of order

Location is superb Very central easy access to transport Room was good size comfortable bed. Didn t realize there was no elevator Would have preferred not to have to climb all those steps But a minor inconvenience

Location was good Very close to the museums and South Ken station Very walkable to Harrods and Knightbridge A very very very different type of hotel decor. The green elevator with artificial grass covering wall to ceiling
